channel.title: Running on Juan Orozco
channel.description: Recent content in Running on Juan Orozco

item.title: Commitment Day 5k â€“ Completed
item.description:
January 1st 5k. I hit the new year running... literally. The Commitment Day run was number one of the six committed 5k's for this year.

Run/walked the 5 kilos in about 36:39.9 minutes (I started the timer late, but ended it late as well.) This run was great. It was a beautiful run through downtown (I love the rain) and it really set the tone for me. Five kilometers isn't a big deal, really. But the commitment of actually going out of my comfort zone and doing them is the important part. Most of the remaining six runs will be mud/obstacle runs - these tend to be funner and more exciting. ðŸ™‚

item.title: My First 5K / Mud Run
item.description: Entering the Rugged Maniac is one of the craziest things Iâ€™ve ever done.Â  I have never pushed myself so hard for so long under this amount of soreness and pain. In hindsight, I donâ€™t think I pushed myself that hard but the race was something I never thought Iâ€™d ever do.
